properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 11 at 8:24PM CST until January 13 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Flood
Advisory for the Fox River...Mazon River...

Fox River at Dayton affecting La Salle County
Mazon River near Coal City affecting Grundy County

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well
as forecast precipitation 24-48 hours into the future.

The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Mazon River near Coal City, or from IL-113 west of Coal City
downstream to confluence with Illinois River.
* until late Sunday night.
* At  745 PM Saturday the stage was 9.6 feet.
* Action stage is 10.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 12.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise to near 11.1 feet by Sunday morning.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...If you encounter a flooded roadway...turn around and
find an alternate route.

Additional information can be found at weather.gov/chicago.
